g.text: Plugin calls adapter.getTools() on connected agent -> auto-maps returned tools to LCD buttons
const tools = await adapter.getTools() // Agent returns its available tools -> Plugin renders 80x80px LCD icons -> User presses button -> adapter.execute(tool.name, context)
+ 3 MORE PAGES: Agent Control, DevOps, Communication
file_read, file_write, bash, git_commit, git_push, git_pr,
+ 2 MORE PAGES: Data Extraction, Task Automation
browse, screenshot, click, type, scroll, extract,
read, edit, write, bash, glob, grep, git_commit,
Present on EVERY agent, always in the same position
These 3 buttons are always Row 2, same position.
Muscle memory carries across every agent you use.
Any AI agent can plug in -- Cursor, Windsurf, Aider, Cline, Continue, Devin, v0, Bolt, Copilot...
1. Implement AgentAdapter interface -> 2. Return your tools from getTools() -> 3. Plugin auto-maps tools to LCD pages
4. User gets physical buttons for YOUR agent's actions -> 5. Haptics, dial, voice, approve/reject all work automatically
Same hardware. Any agent. Buttons adapt.
ONE HARDWARE SURFACE. ANY AI AGENT. BUTTONS ADAPT.
The plugin discovers each agent's tools via getTools() and auto-generates LCD button layouts. Universal buttons (Approve, Reject, Dictate) stay in fixed positions for muscle memory.

svg.text: DWG-005 // DYNAMIC TOOL MAPPING // SHEET 5 OF 8
WISPY CONSOLE // UNIVERSAL AI AGENT CONTROL SURFACE // LOGITECH ACTIONS SDK // HAUSOR LABS 2026
